Wwise Unity Integration » Build for target platform

Designated Platform Plugin Folder

The Unity plug-ins for different platforms are placed under specific folders to be loaded by Unity. See the following list for the folder locations for our supported platforms.

Note: All paths are relative to the Unity project root folder.

Platform

Plugin folder

Android

Assets\Plugins\Android

iOS

Assets\Plugins\iOS

Linux (32 bit)

Assets\Plugins\x86

Linux (64 bit)

Assets\Plugins\x86_64

Mac

Assets\Plugins

Metro

Assets\Plugins\Metro

PS3

Assets\Plugins\PS3

PS4

Assets\Plugins\PS4

PS Vita

Assets\Plugins\PSVita

Windows (32 bit)

Assets\Plugins\x86

Windows (64 bit)

Assets\Plugins\x86_64

Windows Phone 8.0

See Windows Phone 8.0 Specific information

Xbox360

Assets\Plugins

Xbox One

Assets\Plugins\XboxOne
